description: a(n)=T(7,n), array T given by A047848.
comments: Range of A164898, apart from first term. [From _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 30 2009]
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: (10^n + 8)/9. - _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 14 2004a(0)=1, a(1)=2, a(n)=11*a(n-1)-10*a(n-2) for n>1. - Lambert Klasen (lambert.klasen(AT)gmx.net), Jan 28 2005G.f.: (1-9x)/(1-11x+10x^2). [From _Philippe Del√©ham_, Oct 05 2009]a(n)=10*a(n-1)-8 (with a(0)=1) [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 06 2010]
maple: a[0]:=0:a[1]:=1:for n from 2 to 50 do a[n]:=10*a[n-1]+1 od: seq(a[n]+1, n=0..18); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 20 2008
prog: (PARI) a(n)=if(n==0,1,if(n==1,2,11*a(n-1)-10*a(n-2))) for(i=0,10,print1(a(i),",")) (Klasen)(Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,1,10)+1 for n in xrange(0,17)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 29 2009]
crossrefs: n-th difference of a(n), a(n-1), ..., a(0) is 9^(n-1) for n=1, 2, 3, ...
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 17 2013
